stats.choosemealplantitle: According to the result of your BMI, choose a diet to follow!

weightgain.title: Weight Gain Meal Plan
weightgain.tip: Eat calorie-dense, nutrient-rich foods like nuts, avocado, peanut butter, whole grains, and lean protein. Consume multiple meals and snacks throughout the day.
weightgain.breakfast: Breakfast: Protein smoothie with banana, oats, peanut butter, and whole milk (700-800 calories)
weightgain.mid_morning_snack: Mid-Morning Snack: Greek yogurt with granola and honey (300-400 calories)
weightgain.lunch: Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with brown rice, avocado, and olive oil dressing (700-800 calories)
weightgain.afternoon_snack: Afternoon Snack: Handful of almonds, a protein bar, and a banana (400-500 calories)
weightgain.dinner: Dinner: Baked salmon, sweet potato, and steamed broccoli with butter (700-800 calories)
weightgain.evening_snack: Evening Snack: Whole-grain toast with peanut butter and a glass of whole milk (300-400 calories)
weightgain.compound_exercises: Focus on compound exercises: Squats, Deadlifts, Bench Press, Overhead Press
weightgain.progressive_overload: Use progressive overload: Gradually increase weights weekly
weightgain.reps_sets: Perform 4-6 reps per set with heavy weights for muscle growth
weightgain.rest_time: Rest for 2-3 minutes between sets to maximize recovery
weightgain.sessions_per_week: Aim for 4-5 strength training sessions per week
weightgain.limit_cardio: Limit cardio to short sessions to avoid burning excess calories

weightloss.title: Weight Loss Meal Plan
weightloss.tip: Tip: Focus on whole foods, avoid processed sugars, and drink plenty of water throughout the day.
weightloss.breakfast: Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with spinach and a side of mixed berries
weightloss.lunch: Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, cucumbers, cherry tomatoes, and light vinaigrette
weightloss.dinner: Dinner: Baked cod with steamed broccoli and quinoa
weightloss.snacks: Snacks: Carrot sticks with hummus, a small handful of almonds, or an apple with a teaspoon of almond butter
weightloss.hiit_training: Incorporate HIIT (High-Intensity Interval Training) workouts 2-3 times per week.
weightloss.cardio: Perform cardio exercises like jogging, cycling, or swimming for 30-45 minutes.
weightloss.strength_training: Include full-body strength training circuits using bodyweight or light weights.
weightloss.daily_steps: Stay active: Aim for at least 10,000 steps per day.
weightloss.recovery: Recovery is key: Prioritize 7-8 hours of sleep per night to boost metabolism.
